amendment.description: To ensure that children do not lose their private insurance and that uninsured children can get access to private insurance.
amendment.purpose: To ensure that children do not lose their private insurance and that uninsured children can get access to private insurance.

action.text: Amendment SA 47 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 47 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 24.
